title: Fuet, simple and fast template compiler for Vue.js
author: jvanveen
content: readme.md fuetsimple fast vue 2 template compiler using reference template compiler.usagenpm -g fuet# produces commonjs module `module.exports.tabs_tablist`./fuet.js - '../tabs/src/*.vue' -s src -coptions--namespace, -n changes default namespace. [text]-c, --commonjs commonjs format [boolean] [default: false]-, --input glob pattern vue templates. [text] [required]-o, --output output file use. [text]-s, --skip skip parts the template path name. [lijst]-h show help [boolean]devhouse spindle, https://wearespindle.com
